name: Bubble Speed – Addictive Puzzle Action Bubble Shooter Game
name_original: Bubble Speed – Addictive Puzzle Action Bubble Shooter Game
description:
Dive into the deep blue sea for this addictive and fast-paced bubble shooting adventure!
Over 10 million players on Facebook and Mobile already love it:

“Best bubble shooter I've found yet!”
“I've been looking for another bubble game and I'm glad I choose this one!”
“Fun game for all ages!”
“One of the best free games!”

You have 60 seconds to form groups of 3 or more same colored bubbles. The more bubbles you pop the higher your score. Connect with Facebook to invite & challenge your friends.

With its easy to learn, yet hard to master gameplay this app is suitable for everyone from the bubble popping rookie to the master bubble shooter.

KEY FEATURES OF THE GAME:

• A new challenge every time with completely random bubble arrangement.
• Five different extra boosts to achieve even higher scores.
• Login with Facebook: Coins, Lives & Scores are synchronized with Bubble Speed on Facebook.
• You can send lives and boosts to your friends and they can send them also to you.
• The nautilus Quippy guides you through the game.
• Beautifully vibrant underwater artwork and fun animations.
• You can enjoy this game in full retina quality on your iPhone and iPad.

The app is available for iPhone 3GS and later, iPod Touch and iPad.

Become a fan and follow us on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/BubbleSpeed
https://www.facebook.com/GameDuell

Do you have any questions or suggestions?

eMail: iphone-support@gameduell.com
FAQs: https://gameduell.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/sections/200295578-Bubble-Speed-on-Mobile

We’d love to hear from you as we’re constantly looking at new ways to improve and develop the game.

The game is free to play, however in-app purchases are available for additional content and premium currency. In-app purchases of between $0.99 and $20.99 can be made to enhance gameplay through in-game boosts, extra lives and coins. Please note that prices may vary based on currency exchange rates in your country.

You will be given the opportunity to participate in special offers, events, and programs from GameDuell and its partners.
